about_the_game:
Join the discord at discord. gg/omegastrikers!

Smash opponents off the arena and score goals in this lightning-fast 3v3 footbrawler. Sling slimes, toss tofu, and rocket boost to victory as one of 15+ stylish Strikers. Squad up with friends and outplay your rivals to become an Omega Striker.

Omega Strikers has an ever-growing roster of unique and powerful Strikers, each of which can be unlocked through normal play. 3v3 ranked, normals, Quick Play, and custom lobbies are available from day one, with more maps and modes planned. For those looking to dive deeper into the game, cosmetic purchases and battle passes are available via in-app purchase.

No Match the Same

Blast, bounce, and bullrush opponents into hectic and electric map hazards. Sprint at breakneck speed on the Oni Village map and avoid a swirling gravity well on Atlas’s Lab.

Play Your Way

Earn credits to unlock powerful new Strikers, each with unique abilities. Create your custom playstyle with Gear and Awakenings, then upgrade your look with skins and emotes.

Play Anywhere

Party up cross-platform with friends and take your progress anywhere with cross-progression as Omega Strikers rolls out across PC and mobile platforms.

Big Seasonal Updates

Omega Strikers will continually evolve as each new season adds new Strikers, additional stages, fresh unlockables, and more ways to play.

Some content shown may require separate purchase from the in-game store and is subject to availability. Contains in-game purchases.

name: Omega Strikers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, and Windows 11 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB or AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“A unique experience that felt refreshing in the pool of overused genres, would highly recommend”
10/10 – John Sprucelog

“From the gameplay to the soundtrack and the visuals, team play has never felt more exiting.”
10/10 – ConnyF

“this game has ruined my life but I’m too addicted to quit”
10/10 – candywaxcarts
short_description: Join the footbrawl! Smash opponents off the arena and score goals in this lightning-fast 3v3 free-to-play game. Squad up with friends and choose from a growing cast of colorful Strikers to sling slimes, toss tofu, and rocket boost to victory.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
